name: Ben Shapiro 0001
content: R. Benjamin Shapiro Paul G. Allen Center Box 352350 185 Stevens Way NE Seattle, WA 98195-2350 USA I am the Associate Director for Community in the Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Washington (UW), where I am am also Co-Director of the Center for Learning, Computing, and Imagination and an Adjunct Associate Professor in Learning Sciences & Human Development and in Human-Centered Design & Engineering. I am a learning scientist, and my research usually, though not always, focuses on helping youth learn computer science. In addition to my role at UW, I am also a researcher in Appleâs Human-Centered Machine Learning group.
